sense.gloss: to be able (in a position) to do, to be up to the task
to be ready, to be completed
to be made, to be built
to be good at, to be permitted (to do)
to become intimate, to take up (with someone)
to grow, to be raised
to become pregnant
to come (spatially or temporally), to approach, to arrive
to come back, to do ... and come back
to come to be, to become, to get, to grow, to continue
to come from, to be caused by, to derive from
to come to (e.g. "when it comes to spinach ...")
future, (future) prospects
bringing (from abroad, another region, etc.)
bringing about, giving rise to, causing, incurring
next year
next month
Tathagata, perfected one (suffix of high-ranking Buddhist deities)
week after next
traditional farming
tower-shaped wooden talisman
apron-shaped straw deity to ward off disease

sdata.j: イエス↑振↑↓ふり↓↑反↑↓かえ↓りて、その↑從↑↓したが↓ひ↑來↑↓き↓たるを↑見↑↓み↓て↑言↑↓い↓ひ↑給↑↓たま↓ふ「↑何↑↓なに↓を↑求↑↓もと↓むるか」。
sdata.e: Turning around, Jesus saw them following and asked, "What do you want?"

sdata.j: イエス、ナタナエルの↑己↑↓おのれ↓が↑許↑↓もと↓に來たるを↑見↑↓み↓、これを↑指↑↓さ↓して↑言↑↓げん↓ひ↑給↑↓きゅう↓ふ「↑視↑↓み↓よ、↑眞↑↓まこと↓にイスラエル↑人↑↓じん↓なり、その衷に噓僞なし」。
sdata.e: When Jesus saw Nathanael approaching, he said of him, "Here truly is an Israelite in whom there is no deceit."

sdata.j: すべて惡を↑行↑↓くだり↓ふ↑者↑↓しゃ↓は↑光↑↓ひかり↓をにくみて↑光↑↓ひかり↓に來らず、その↑行↑↓くだり↓爲の↑責↑↓せ↓められざらん爲なり。
sdata.e: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light, neither cometh to the light, lest his deeds should be reproved.
